Parallels.ab: xᵛanuuaitīš aṣ̌ahe vərəzō yazamaide ~ VrS62.5 xᵛanuuaitīš vərəzō yazamaide; ~ Yt3.1 xvanuuaitīšca vərəzō.

iristanąm uruuąnō š́āiieṇti yā̊ aṣ̌āunąm frāuuaṣ̌aiiō ~ Y26.6, Y26.10, Y59.25, Y71.24, VrS18.5, VrS30.11, VrS36.5, VrS41.6, VrS51.8, VrS57.8, VrS62.8, VrS64.9, VrS65.82, VrS69.8, VrS71.8, VrS81.24, VrS87.12, VrS93.11, DrYt4.15 iristanąm uruuąnō yazamaide yā̊ aṣ̌āunąm frāuuaṣ̌aiiō.
